segments.text: Hey Michelle . Good to see you . Are you at lunch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh hi Jim . No I just got back . I thought you were on vacation now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I wish I was ! I just got back from Spain actually .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh wonderful ! Have you been there before or was it your first time ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My first time . I've traveled around Europe a lot , but this was my first time to Spain . It was amazing , and the weather was just beautiful ! No rain , and just sun , sun , sun ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm so jealous of you . I've never been anywhere in Europe . I've always dreamed of traveling around and seeing the sights .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I really recommend Spain . You really should go . Anyway , it's been great to catch up , but I must be going , this is my floor . Speak again soon I hope .
segments.speaker: S1
